replies.body:
Okay!
Follow ME!

Hit Windows Button
Type in 'reset windows'
Then on the sidebar click 'Settings'
Then select 'Remove everything and reinstall windows'
Then select the button that is circled

It will take at least a hour or 2 so sit back with a good book :)
Enjoy your computer reset but you said that it has a bunch of viruses on it. I would suggest if you don't have one get a good antivirus software I would reccommend this one and the website is here

If you have any questions reply so I can see it :)
